name: ultimate
description: An Electron-based application to become the very best

scripts.package:win: yarn run react:compile && yarn run react:build && yarn run electron:build && electron-builder -c.extraMetadata.main=./build_electron/main
scripts.package:linux: yarn run react:compile && yarn run react:build && yarn run electron:build && electron-builder --linux --x64 -c.extraMetadata.main=./build_electron/main
